boardgame.name: Marvel Dice Masters: Avengers vs. X-Men
boardgame.description: Marvel Dice Masters: Avengers vs. X-Men is a collectible dice-building tabletop game designed by Quarriors! creators Michael Elliott and Eric M. Lang._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this game, each player fields one of the superhero teams, with each hero _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; Captain America, Wolverine, Spider-Man, and more _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; being represented by custom-tooled dice; each team must be composed of up to 20 dice, and a player can _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;purchase_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; dice only from his team. Each hero also has one or more character reference cards, which show the special abilities for the characters based on the die rolls. Different versions of these cards will be available in booster packs, allowing for more customization of your team. Players use these dice to collect energy, recruit new heroes, and battle head-to-head. In addition, each player brings two basic action cards to the game, which are placed in the center of the table; both players can purchase these cards. A player wins once the opposing player has been reduced to zero life._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The Marvel Dice Masters: Avengers vs. X-Men starter set comes with 44 custom dice, 38 cards, two dice bags, and a core rulebook. Booster packs include two dice with two matching character cards._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

**THIS LISTING IS NOT FOR A COMPLETE STARTER, YOU SUPPLY CHARACTERS - PLEASE READ CAREFULLY** For those of you with booster packs but no starter set, as I know has been the case for many, here is a deal for you. This listing is for the following items, all from the starter: -1 Rule Book -12 basic action dice (3 each in 4 ink colors) -16 sidekick dice (white) -10 basic action cards -4 color reminder cards -2 dice bags I will package these in a starter box. This does NOT include any of the starter characters or associated character dice. It only includes the items listed above, which when combined with a large amount of boosters will allow you to play the game NOW instead of having to wait for the next production of starters. Message me if you have any questions! Price does not include shipping.
